H0.text: At the football stadium in which city is the 'Baseball Bar and Grill'. Manchester

H1.text: At the football stadium in which city is the 'Baseball Bar and Grill'. Liverpool

H2.text: At the football stadium in which city is the 'Baseball Bar and Grill'. Birmingham

H3.text: At the football stadium in which city is the 'Baseball Bar and Grill'. DERBY

A4.text: The club moved from its century-old Baseball Ground in 1997 to the new Pride Park Stadium.

A5.text: The attempt to establish baseball in Derby was unsuccessful, but the stadium survived for some 100 years afterwards as the home of Derby County Football Club.
